channel.title: 1 Timothy on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive
channel.description: Recent content in 1 Timothy on Scrollmapper Biblical Text Archive

item.title: 1 Timothy - American Standard-ASV1901 (ASV)
item.description: [1:1] Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus according to the commandment of God our Saviour, and Christ Jesus our hope; [1:2] unto Timothy, my true child in faith: Grace, mercy, peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord. [1:3] As I exhorted thee to tarry at Ephesus, when I was going into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge certain men not to teach a different doctrine, [1:4] neither to give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questionings, rather than a dispensation of God which is in faith; `so do I now’.

item.title: 1 Timothy - Bible in Basic English (BBE)
1 Timothy - King James Version (KJV)
1 Timothy - World English Bible (WEB)
1 Timothy - Young's Literal Translation (YLT)
item.description: [1:1] Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to a command of God our Saviour, and of the Lord Jesus Christ our hope, [1:2] to Timotheus – genuine child in faith: Grace, kindness, peace, from God our Father, and Christ Jesus our Lord, [1:3] according as I did exhort thee to remain in Ephesus – I going on to Macedonia – that thou mightest charge certain not to teach any other thing,
